captions.text:
In front of me,
too many burdens piled up
I am in a double bind

I can't give up the moment
I've been waiting for

Seeking for freedom
that I want truly

To the place
you don't care about others

Long-pending troubles, irritation,
and lingering feelings
I will blow them to pieces

With many.. no.. three..
no.. just two of us

No, just being alone
is good good good

Just like that
As you want

Fill it or empty it or
do whatever you want

Seeking for freedom
that I want truly

Right now Right now
Just get away

comments.text:
i love this song! their harmonies are so sweet to hear, especially since 
they are so different from what we usually hear, and it's nice to 'just get 
away' from the norm :D The song is so catchy, and I've been listening to it 
ever since it first came out! The swing and flow of the song is what gets 
me the most because it's so nice! Although, I love every single second of 
this song, I do wonder who is singing at 2:29? Like DAMNN his voice is so 
low, but smooth and sweet and everything!﻿

comments.text:
I will tell voices in the order of singing in the beginning of the song. 
The first voice is of Woojin who has the lowest tone. The next voice is of 
Hojin who has the highest tone. The third voice is Youngwoo's one and the 
next voice is Jinhwan's voice. As I remember Jinhwan has higher tone than 
Youngwoo... If it is wrong please correct it. You may watch M/V of "Viva" 
for their tones.
